youtube._comment_credentials_file: Path to store user's OAuth 2.0 credentials. Auto-generated/updated after first successful authentication.

client_secrets_config._comment_client_secrets_config: Embedded application client secrets (obtained from Google Cloud Console). Preferred if present.

youtube._comment_client_secrets_file_alternative: Alternatively, instead of "client_secrets_config", you can use "client_secrets_file": "path/to/your/client_secret.json"
youtube._comment_client_secrets_priority: If both "client_secrets_config" and "client_secrets_file" are specified, "client_secrets_config" will be used.

gemini._comment_api_key: Your API key for Google Gemini.
